name: lucky-punch
effect: Held by Chansey: Raises the holder’s critical hit counter by 2.
short_effect: Raises Chansey’s critical hit ratio by two stages.

flavor_text.black_white: An item to be held by Chansey. It is a pair of gloves that boosts Chansey’s critical-hit ratio.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: An item to be held by Chansey. It is a pair of gloves that boosts Chansey’s critical-hit ratio.
